long_description:
minetest mod which provides a simple node which can change color when sent a signal.

usage:

1. program a channel
2. send a digiline signal

```lua
digiline_send("test", 255) -- set the color to white
```

see README.md for an index of color codes.
name: digicolor
short_description: node whose color can be set via digilines
title: digicolor
